%!TeX dicy-3:filePath = images/dicy-3.eps
\documentclass{article}

\usepackage{xstring}
\usepackage[pdftex]{graphicx}

\IfEqCase*{\jobname}{%
  {job-1}{\usepackage{epstopdf}}%
  {job-2}{\usepackage{epstopdf}}}

\graphicspath{{images/}}

\begin{document}

\IfEqCase*{\jobname}{%
  {job-1}{\includegraphics{dicy-1}}%
  {job-2}{\includegraphics{dicy-2}}%
  {job-3}{\includegraphics{dicy-3}}}

\end{document}
